title: Pheasant with mushroom, kale and figs
description: A sweet fig purée is the perfect foil to flavourful pheasant. Serve with woody wild mushrooms for a special supper. For this recipe you will need a silicone muffin mould and a blender.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz ripe black or green figs, whole
salt and freshly ground black pepper
200g/7oz mixed wild mushrooms, such as girolles, chanterelles and trompets
